promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young mythical gorilla fire-type holding a ancient shield. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Blazegor, a chibi young mythical gorilla fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: shell-trap. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word gorilla or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, gorilla-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Blazegor stomps and burns the hot desert sand. Living among scorching cactus, it trembles and traps foes with its shell.
